segments.text: I'm still thinking about that wobbly stool the boy is standing on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out, and it's tilted backward quite a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It really looks like it's on the verge of collapsing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretched upward, reaching for those cookies, completely focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He doesn't seem to notice the instability beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height, especially onto a wet floor, would be quite painful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can practically see it tipping over in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so focused on the cookies, she's also oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop them before an accident happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a heart-stopping moment to observe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a pang of anxiety watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The precariousness of his position is truly unnerving.
segments.speaker: PAR
